insert into ted_special_certification_applicant (candidates_id, plan_id, image_url, create_user, create_time, status) values
(#{item.candidatesId}, #{item.planId}, #{item.imageUrl}, #{createdUserId}, now(), #{item.status})
mapper.select: select tsca.*,su.nickname AS candidatesName, tep.exam_plan_name AS planName from ted_special_certification_applicant tsca LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON tsca.candidates_id = su.id LEFT JOIN ted_exam_plan tep on tep.id = tsca.plan_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
